infos.value: Prepare yourself!
He vanished!?
...Gah!
Maybe it's about time you considered yielding? I promise that I'll be good to you.
You'd prefer that to pain, surely?
Listening to you is painful enough!
You really intend...to make me go all out, huh?
Just as you've said, I do not intend to hold back.
What are you doing in Hourne territory?
Oh, my. Aren't you a pretty little thing?
What do you say to becoming my woman?
And...who are you, exactly?
For your name, I'll give you mine a dozen times over.
I'm Camillo. I hope we get along well.
I am Machérie, daughter of King Robb.
Robb's daughter!? That'd make you the princess of Hourne!
I'm Deah, from the kingdom of Ovis.
I came here seeking reinforcements.
Reinforcements?
My lady, Ovis is on the verge of complete and total annihilation at the hands of Rundall...
So...that would make this hungry little mutt one of Rundall's?
Oh, please, get it right. My homeland is Heindler.
Lady Machérie, that's—!
B-Brother!?
Brother...? N-now just hold on a moment...
Are you telling me that corpse is the prince of Hourne!?
Who did this!?
I-it was not me.
Then it was this bastard!
H-hey, calm down! I...
(Xiza... What should we do?)
(That Camillo fellow will only muddy the waters...)
(Shall we deal with him?)
Filthy Rundall hound! We won't just let you get away!
...Tch. So that's where all this gets me, huh?
Though I'm not the type to hit a woman...
If I die here, all the other ladies of the world would end up drowning in their own tears...
